content:
Kushdham poondor sau-khyam nedi
Andhanmaar kaazhcha-praapichu
Thandhvani ketta mrtha-ruththhitharaayu
Odi mudantanmaar-sheeghratthil
Thanne ayacha pithaa-vathi dhanyan.

Nikadam praapicha-roginiyil
Vasthratthaal saukhyam-thaan chertthu
Yaayeerosinte-mrthayaaya
Puthrikkuyireki-nammude mel
Than daya varshichon-samsthuthyan.

Arththhicha kanaanya-sthree saukhyam
Puthrikkaarjichu-thaan shvaave-
Nnotheettum kopam-theendaattholl
Muttippaal saukhyam-kaikkondu
Thannarumappennaa-daayttheernnu.

Atthiyil sakkaayye-thaan kandu
Abraahaamsuthane!-ennothi
Veettil virunniniru-nnathu vaazhtthi
Paapam theertthavane-nannaakki
Thanne ayacha pithaa-vathi dhanyan.

Chollil mudantanmaar-saukhyatthe
Poondathilathbhuthamaar-kooreedaa?
Mrtharaayoraajnyaa-shravanatthil
Nyettiyunarnnaarppaal-paadeedum
Kaanumpoll sthuthiyaar-paadeedaa?
